Hello Beneficiary,

where given a bill of sum in order to receive your

Payment of which we didnâ€™t hear from you for sometime now. Hence, our

to help all our customers that are abandoned their payment in our custody
because of their financial difficulties. In order

that after (3 DAYS) if you didn't make the payment of $44.00 then we will

your payment so that we will register your payment once we receive the

your payment as from tomorrow morning.

subject: Re:
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm doing well, thank you for asking. I must say, your message has piqued my interest. 

I understand that there's a sum of money that was supposed to be transferred to me but hasn't been due to some complications. However, I'm a bit confused about the details. Could you please clarify what this payment is for? And why was it abandoned in your custody?

Also, you mentioned something about a special bonus being offered by your Money Gram Office. Could you tell me more about this bonus and how it works?

Lastly, you mentioned a certain amount that needs to be paid in order to receive the payment. How exactly do I go about making this payment? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Dean

subject: Today has been February 15th i
body:
Today has been February 15th is the last email you will receive from us after today this Fund will be canceled, I just want to let you know.
 
I'm Mrs. Sonia Sotomayor, from the U.S. Supreme Court of Justice, I'm here to know if I will get a reply from you so that I will know what to do.
 
Your Funds worth the sum of US$15,500,000.00 USD. Was brought to my desk for cancellation so I'm texting you just because of the kind of person I am that's why I'm texting you for the last time.
 
The fact is that Our government told me to cancel the funds and confiscated it into our government account but I am having much feelings to text you first if you are still willing to receive it then I will work everything out for you and get the package mailed to your home address.
 
So I will wait for your response from now till tomorrow morning then if I don't get any response from you then I will sign it cancelled.
 
I have already completed all the necessary arrangements to ship your funds directly to your home address to make sure you received the pending Fund worth of US$15,500,000.00 USD with this opportunity to avoid it being canceled and refund to the U.S. Department Treasurer Account.
 
Regards to this development? Our Authorities required that you will pay only $25.00 USD Made for Tax Clearance Stamp Duty charges
, So that we can finally complete your transaction peacefully. Get back to confirm that you received this and please give us the proper date to pay the required $25.00 USD possible today.
 
From: Mrs. Sonia Sotomayor; 
btsholden@gmail.com
:
barristerjohnbarristerjohn90@gmail.com
whatsapp +2202743157
Regards.Mrs. Sonia Sotomayor.
U.S. Supreme Court of Justice, 
USA
.

subject: Re: Today has been February 15th i
body:
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to me, Mrs. Sonia Sotomayor. I appreciate you informing me about the pending funds worth USD. Can you please provide more details about the process of receiving the funds and the reason behind the tax clearance stamp duty charges? I want to make sure I understand everything clearly before proceeding.

Best wishes,
Judith
